full_summary:
====================

#### Tender Announcement

#### Reference Information
-----------------------

*   Solicitation number: W3162_24_F018
*   Tender closing date: Thursday, July 19, 2024, at 12:59 PM.
*   Bidder inquiry contact: Louise Pelletier
    — Email: [louise.pelletier@forces.gc.ca](mailto:louise.pelletier@forces.gc.ca)
    — Phone: (514) 252-2777
    — Address: 6363 Notre Dame east building 2 north, Montréal, QC, H1N 3V9, Canada

#### Tender Opening
----------------

The National Defence 3CSU  issued an Open and Competitive Request for Proposal (RFP) to acquire a purchase of electrical equipment for its overseas missions.

#### Tendered Goods/Services
---------------------------

*   **Expected Contract Start date:** Monday, July 22, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End date:** Wednesday, July 31, 2024
*   **Trade Agreements:** The contract subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) is applicable
*   **Goods/Services Description:** Electronic hardware and component parts and accessories (UNSPSC code: *32130000)
*   **Goods/Services regions of delivery:** Montreal, QC (communicated in English as 'region d'approvisionnement' rather than "Montreal, QC")

#### Submission Information
-------------------------

*   Proposals must be submitted electronically as an attachment to IRP (Internet Request for Proposal by email)
*   Contractor should address in their submission letter their commitment to ADS ( Automated Document Set).  For any issues  or cost inquiries, investors can contact  CPU service desk through [ads-bdcdt3d@forces.gc.ca](mailto:ads-bdcdt3d@forces.gc.ca)

In this Entry, Only/mportant details were included to reduce rambling, while keeping the text focused.

Please,note that this is a government tenders announcement.

I hope this is clear and meets all requirements!  Please let me know if you need any substantial changes.

Best regards, 
Your Name

---
